column4: is there a zipped and compressed version of ubuntu jaunty for me to download?
the isos are what you're looking for.
No.  They wouldn't be significantly smaller.  Everything on the iso (well, 95% of it) is already compressed.
Is there some other Ubuntu support question we can help you with?
How long will it take on uncapped broadband?
It's 700MB, so not very long at all.
